submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        d = [0] * (k + 2)
        n = len(nums)
        for i in range(n // 2):
            a, b = nums[i], nums[n-i-1]
            c = abs(a - b)
            m = max(a, k - a, b, k - b)
            d[0] += 1
            d[c] -= 1
            d[c+1] += 1
            d[m+1] += 1
        res = n
        x = 0
        for i in range(k + 1):
            x += d[i]
            res = min(res, x)
        return res
